articles.author: Cooper Hudson, Russ McQuaid, Matt Adams
articles.title: Delphi Trial: ISP Lt. recounts Richard Allen’s arrest, interviews - FOX 59 Indianapolis
articles.description: CAROLL COUNTY, Ind. — On Day 8 of the Delphi murders trial — exactly two years after Richard Allen was arrested — Indiana State Police Lieutenant Jerry Holeman was called to the witness stand to recount both the arrest of Richard Allen and interviews he gave …
